channel.title: Comments on: Split a Query Window in SSMS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: Nice! You are right. I would have never found it without you telling me exactly where it was. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Nice! You are right. I would have never found it without you telling me exactly where it was. Thanks!

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: I have it in 2008 R2 but no double arrows, just an eentsy-weentsy bar above the scroll arrow, but in the same position. Nice tip, Jes!
item.content:encoded: I have it in 2008 R2 but no double arrows, just an eentsy-weentsy bar above the scroll arrow, but in the same position. Nice tip, Jes!

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description: I don't think the split window is available in SSMS before version 2012.
item.content:encoded: I don’t think the split window is available in SSMS before version 2012.
